function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased density in urban areas leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases among a large population","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce population density and increase space for social distancing","Technologies":"Smart city planning and digital transformation tools","People":"Residents in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners and city officials"},{"Description":"Reliance on telecommuting and digital communication leading to reduced social interaction","Impact":"Decreased social interaction and potential impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Balancing remote work with opportunities for in-person interaction and social activities","Technologies":"Teleconferencing and communication tools, smart city planning for social infrastructure","People":"Employees, citizens","Owner":"Employers, city officials"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the long-term impact of the pandemic and future social effects","Impact":"Lack of preparedness for future outbreaks or social changes","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to understand long-term impacts and planning for potential future scenarios","Technologies":"Data analytics and predictive modeling, public health monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Researchers, public health officials, city planners","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
